attributes.action: instruct the judiciary to follow the example of other European countries who use a bit of common sense and who also consider the spirit/intent of the Human Rights Act when interpreting the Act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British public have lost a great deal of faith in the Human Rights Act. Too many lawyers on behalf of too many minority groups with vested interests are successfully abusing the spirit/intent of the Act for pecuniary gain and/or the pursuit of their own totally selfish agendas. This trend must be reversed.
